item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会在压力测试后设定大型银行资本水平，对高盛的水平有所放宽
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会周三宣布，已在 6 月份的年度压力测试后为大型银行设定了最新的资本缓冲，但同意减轻高盛的负担。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced on Wednesday it had set the latest capital cushions for large banks following June's annual stress tests, but agreed to shrink Goldman Sachs' burden.】

item.title: 亚洲 Nvidia 等待游戏结束，谨慎降临
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道政府消息人士称，特斯拉要求加拿大降低对中国产电动汽车的关税
item.description: 一位加拿大政府消息人士周三表示，在加拿大本周宣布对中国制造的电动汽车征收 100% 的关税之前，特斯拉曾与渥太华接触，要求降低其汽车关税。【原文：Before Canada said this week it was imposing a 100% duty on Chinese-made electric vehicles, Tesla approached Ottawa and asked for a lower tariff on its autos, a Canadian government source said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在美国竞争和通货膨胀的影响下，新西兰航空公司年度盈利下降 61
item.description: 受激烈竞争和高通胀压力的影响，国内和北美市场的旅游需求受到冲击，新西兰航空公司周四公布的年度收益下降了61%。【原文：Air New Zealand posted a 61% drop in its annual earnings on Thursday, hurt by stiff competition and high inflationary pressure, which is impacting travel demand in its domestic as well as in the North American market.】

item.title: Reddit 正在调查美国数千用户的网络中断问题
item.description: 社交媒体平台 Reddit 周三表示，它正在调查影响美国数千名用户的网络中断事件。【原文：Social media platform Reddit said on Wednesday it was investigating an outage that has affected thousands of users in the U.S.】

item.title: 英伟达预测第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三预测第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，并押注随着越来越多的公司寻求建立人工智能业务，市场对其芯片的需求将大幅增长。【原文：Nvidia forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on sky-high demand for its chips as more companies seek to build our their artificial-intelligence businesses.】

item.title: 惠普在个人电脑市场复苏和人工智能需求的推动下恢复收入增长
item.description: 惠普公司（HP Inc）周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，这是该公司在连续八个季度下滑后首次实现季度营收增长。【原文：HP Inc beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, marking its first quarter of revenue growth after eight consecutive quarters of decline.】

item.title: Chipotle 任命公司资深员工 Adam Rymer 担任财务总监
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill 周三任命 Adam Rymer 自 10 月 1 日起担任首席财务官。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill on Wednesday appointed Adam Rymer as its chief financial officer from Oct. 1.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 下调年度收入预期，Windows 故障影响新交易
item.description: CrowdStrike 公司周三下调了年度营收预期，这表明其网络安全产品的需求正受到上个月因该公司错误更新而导致的全球 Windows 系统故障的影响。【原文：CrowdStrike cut its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, in a sign that demand for its cybersecurity products was taking a toll from last month's global Windows outage caused by a faulty update from the company.】

item.title: Salesforce 预测第三季度营收低于预期
item.description: 本周三，Salesforce 预计第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是在经济不确定的情况下，企业云产品支出减少。【原文：Salesforce forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, hit by weaker spending on its enterprise cloud products in an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 迪斯尼旗下的 ESPN 签订协议，将在 2037 年之前播出美国网球公开赛
item.description: 迪斯尼旗下的 ESPN 电视网周三表示，已与美国网球协会签署协议，将继续转播美国网球公开赛至 2037 年。【原文：Walt Disney's ESPN signed a deal with the United States Tennis Association to continue broadcasting the U.S. Open tournament through 2037, the network said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：OpenAI 正在洽谈融资，估值超过 1000 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，热门软件 ChatGPT 背后的初创公司 OpenAI 正在商讨在新一轮融资中筹集数十亿美元，其估值可能超过 1000 亿美元。【原文：OpenAI, the startup behind the popular ChatGPT, is reportedly in discussions to raise billions of dollars in a new funding round that could see it valued at above $100 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行将 2024 年国内生产总值预期下调至 1.5
item.description: 墨西哥央行周三发布的季度报告显示，墨西哥央行下调了今明两年的经济增长预期，理由是国外制造业需求疲软，而通货膨胀依然顽固。【原文：The Bank of Mexico cut its forecast for economic growth this year and next, according to the central bank's quarterly report released on Wednesday, citing weaker foreign manufacturing demand while inflation remains stubborn.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，Meta 公司考虑将新型混合现实眼镜作为头显的替代品
item.description: 据《信息报》周三援引社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 的两名员工的话报道，Meta Platforms 正在计划推出一款类似笨重眼镜的混合现实设备。【原文：Meta Platforms is planning a mixed reality device that resembles a bulky pair of glasses, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing two employees from the social media giant.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长表示，卢拉将提名加里波洛担任央行行长
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周三告诉记者，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）已选定央行货币政策主任加布里埃尔-加里波洛（Gabriel Galipolo）为下一任央行行长，接替任期将于12月结束的罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has picked central bank monetary policy director Gabriel Galipolo to be the next governor of the institution, replacing Roberto Campos Neto whose term ends in December, Finance Minister Fernando Haddad told journalists on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管受到乌克兰战争制裁，俄罗斯经济仍保持稳健增长
item.description: 周三的新数据显示，俄罗斯经济在许多领域都实现了稳健增长，同时失业率保持在历史最低水平，这促使官员们暗示，尽管西方国家因乌克兰战争而对俄罗斯实施制裁，但俄罗斯今年的经济前景依然光明。【原文：The Russian economy has shown solid growth in many sectors while unemployment remains at a record low, new data showed on Wednesday, prompting officials to hint at a brighter outlook for the year despite Western sanctions over the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 巴西 7 月份创造的正式工作岗位少于预期
item.description: 巴西劳工部周三公布的数据显示，7 月份巴西经济净创造了 188,021 个正式工作岗位，略低于路透社调查的经济学家预期的 190,000 个工作岗位。【原文：Brazil's economy created a net 188,021 formal jobs in July, labor ministry data released on Wednesday showed, slightly below the expectation of 190,000 jobs from economists polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 内部备忘录称，汽车制造商福特将修改多元化政策
item.description: 汽车制造商福特汽车公司（Ford Motor）周三表示，它将改变其多元化、公平和包容计划，包括停止参与一个 LGBTQ 权益组织的排名系统，加入在保守团体的压力下重新定义这些计划的几家美国公司的行列。【原文：Automaker Ford Motor said on Wednesday it will change its diversity, equity and inclusion program, including ending participation in an LGBTQ advocacy group's ranking system, joining several U.S. companies that have redefined those programs amid pressure from conservative groups.】

item.title: SpaceX 猎鹰 9 号着陆尝试失败后搁浅
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周三表示，SpaceX公司的主力火箭猎鹰9号（Falcon 9）在一次例行的 "星链"（Starlink）任务中试图返回地球着陆失败，被迫停飞，这是该公司今年以来第二次停飞。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration on Wednesday said SpaceX's workhorse Falcon 9 rocket has been grounded after failing an attempt to land back on Earth during a routine Starlink mission, forcing the company's second grounding this year.】

item.title: 马士基称远洋航运业推动零排放需要政府支持
item.description: Alette Maersk 号是第一艘使用低碳甲醇燃料穿越太平洋的集装箱船，这是航运业努力减少对气候影响的一个里程碑。【原文：The Alette Maersk was the first container vessel powered by low-carbon methanol fuel to cross the Pacific Ocean - a milestone in the shipping industry's effort to reduce its climate impact.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司空乘人员投票支持罢工授权
item.description: 美国空乘协会（Association of Flight Attendants-CWA）周三表示，美国联合航空公司的空乘人员已投票赞成罢工授权。【原文：Flight attendants at United Airlines have voted in favor of a strike authorization, the Association of Flight Attendants-CWA said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 迪士尼认为人工智能有助于个性化新版 ESPN 应用程序
item.description: ESPN主席吉米-皮塔洛（Jimmy Pitaro）周三表示，随着年轻观众对流媒体电视的追捧，沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）旗下的ESPN电视网正在探索使用人工智能来帮助个性化其新闻和回顾节目 "体育中心"（SportsCenter）。【原文：Walt Disney's ESPN network is exploring the use of artificial intelligence to help personalize its news and recap show "SportsCenter" as younger audiences embrace streaming TV, ESPN Chairperson Jimmy Pitaro said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 两名共和党人希望五角大楼将中国电池制造商 CATL 列入限制名单
item.description: 两位共和党高级议员周三要求美国国防部将中国电池制造商 CATL 列入据称与北京军方合作的公司限制名单。【原文：Two top Republican lawmakers on Wednesday asked the U.S. Defense Department to add Chinese battery maker CATL to a restricted list of companies allegedly working with Beijing's military.】

item.title: 泰诺生产商驳回标签诉讼
item.description: 泰诺（Tylenol）的生产商打败了消费者的诉讼，消费者称他们被欺骗，多付了 "快速释放 "胶囊的钱，但这种胶囊的止痛速度并不比便宜的药片（包括标有特强和普通强度的药片）快。【原文：The maker of Tylenol defeated a lawsuit by consumers who said they were deceived into overpaying for "Rapid Release" gelcaps that did not relieve pain faster than cheaper tablets, including those labeled Extra Strength and Regular Strength.】

item.title: 暂停后，Alphabet 将在双子座上推出图像生成器
item.description: Alphabet 周三表示，它已经更新了 Gemini 的人工智能图像创建模型，并将在未来几天内推出生成人物视觉图像的功能，此前该功能已暂停数月之久。【原文：Alphabet said on Wednesday it has updated Gemini's AI image-creation model and would roll out the generation of visuals of people in the coming days, after months-long pause of the capability.】

item.title: 美国旅行者将以创纪录的劳动节航空旅行为夏季画上圆满句号
item.description: 美国的航空公司和机场正在为最繁忙的劳动节周末做准备，因为将有创纪录数量的旅行者收拾行囊，准备在旅游季节结束前乘飞机去享受最后一次夏日之旅。【原文：U.S. airlines and airports are gearing up for the busiest Labor Day weekend, as a record number of travelers pack their bags and prepare to jet off to squeeze one last summer trip before the season ends.】

item.title: 在巴西，Meta 因允许虚假的哈万广告而面临 360 万美元的罚款
item.description: 巴西连锁百货公司 Havan 起诉 Meta Platforms，指控该社交媒体公司接受付费广告，欺诈性地使用该零售商的名称欺骗消费者，Meta Platforms 在败诉后面临最高 362 万美元的罚款。【原文：Meta Platforms faces a fine of up to $3.62 million after losing a lawsuit by Brazilian department store chain Havan that accused the social media company of accepting paid advertisements that fraudulently use the retailer's name to deceive consumers.】

item.title: 环保组织称，马斯克的 xAI 数据中心在未经许可的情况下运行燃气轮机
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正面临着来自环境和健康倡导者的批评，据称该公司在未获得必要许可的情况下，在其数据中心使用天然气涡轮机，造成了田纳西州孟菲斯市的污染。【原文：Elon Musk's AI startup, xAI, is facing criticism from environmental and health advocates for allegedly contributing to pollution in Memphis, Tennessee, by using natural gas-burning turbines at its data center without obtaining necessary permits.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会威胁起诉 NFT 市场 OpenSea 首席执行官称
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（SEC）首席执行官周三在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）威胁要起诉不可兑换代币（NFTs）市场 OpenSea。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has threatened to sue non-fungible tokens (NFTs) marketplace OpenSea, its CEO said in a post on social media platform X on Wednesday.】

item.title: 赛博朋克制造商 CD Projekt 上半年净利润增长 88
item.description: 波兰最大的游戏开发商 CD Projekt 周三公布，受其旗舰游戏《赛博朋克》（Cyberpunk）销量增加的推动，该公司上半年净利润同比增长 88%。【原文：Poland's biggest games developer CD Projekt posted on Wednesday an 88% year-on-year jump in its first-half net profit, driven by higher sales of its flagship Cyberpunk game.】
